price: Wala usiyafuate usiyo na ujuzi nayo. Hakika masikio, na macho, na moyo - hivyo vyote vitasailiwa.
arabic: وَلَا تَقۡفُ مَا لَيۡسَ لَكَ بِهِۦ عِلۡمٌۚ إِنَّ ٱلسَّمۡعَ وَٱلۡبَصَرَ وَٱلۡفُؤَادَ كُلُّ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ كَانَ عَنۡهُ مَسۡـُٔولٗا
footnotes: Ewe mtu! Usifuate maneno wala vitendo usivyo vijua. Basi usiseme: Nimesikia...na hali hukusikia. Au: Najua...na hali hujui. Kwani masikio, macho na moyo, vyote hivyo Siku ya Kiyama vitamuuliza mtu kwa alivyo tenda kwavyo.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: walā taqfu mā laysa laka bihi ʿil'mun inna al-samʿa wal-baṣara wal-fuāda kullu ulāika kāna ʿanhu masūlan
